title: News24.com | 'Where is the water to wash our hands?' - Khayelitsha protesters ask ahead of lockdown
description: People have picketed outside Cape Town Civic Centre ahead of the nationwide lockdown, demanding that water be provided to Khayelitsha's informal settlements.
content:
"We have the soap, but where is the water to wash our hands?"
This was the cry of a group of people who picketed outside Cape Town Civic Centre ahead of the nationwide lockdown to prevent the spread of the novel coronavirus. They demanded that water be provi… [+2875 chars]
